mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (`board`.`uid`, `board`.`title`, `board`.`link`, `board`.`date`) values ((SELECT `user`.`uid` FROM `user` WHERE `user`.`certification` = #{token}), #{boardModel.title}, #{boardModel.link}, DATE(now()));
mapper.select: SELECT `board`.`gid` AS `index`, `user`.`name`, `board`.`title`, `board`.`link`, `board`.`date`, `like`.`like`, `like`.`dislike`, `like`.`userlike` FROM `board` LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT `likeTemp`.`gid`, `likeTemp`.`like`, `likeTemp`.`dislike`, (SELECT `likeYn` FROM `like` WHERE `like`.`gid` = `likeTemp`.`gid` AND `like`.`uid` = (SELECT `user`.`uid` FROM `user` WHERE `user`.`certification` = #{token})) AS `userlike` FROM ( SELECT `gid`, COUNT(IF(`likeYn`='Y', `likeYn`, NULL)) AS `like`, COUNT(IF(`likeYn`='N', `likeYn`, NULL)) AS `dislike` FROM `like` GROUP BY `gid` ) AS `likeTemp`) AS `like` ON `board`.`gid` = `like`.`gid` JOIN `user` ON `board`.`uid` = `user`.`uid`
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `like` WHERE `like`.`gid` = #{likeModel.gid} AND `like`.`uid` = ( SELECT `user`.`uid` FROM `user` WHERE `user`.`certification` = #{likeModel.token} )
